review: I bought this device for two reasons, to be able to "project" from my Windows laptop, and because it was such a great value. As a streaming device it's a great value. The fact that it comes with a remote is great. I have used the following apps and found them all to work well: Hulu Plus, Smithsonian, Amazons Weather app. The PBS app did not work quite right (the main panel displayed a message to register Fire TV, but the video clips below that message played videos fine).I will keep the device in the hope that Amazon Develops support for Miracast that actually works from Windows laptops (Miracast is supposed to be a device independent standard). As a Netflix / Hulu player, it is great.
author: T J Watson

review: I really like the fire tv stick installation is a wiz easy to view and control I highly recommend
author: Lillian Ochoa

review: Unplugged it from my tv and it damaged my HDMI port on my 55" TV. Now I am left with only one hdmi port and all Amazon did was provide a partial credit for the fire stick purchase (not nearly enough to cover repairing my hdmi port)! Stay away from this device.
author: Reviewerr

review: I have 2 of these. I hooked both up and both worked perfectly for a few hours. Now I keep getting messages saying to check the internet connection and when I do the connection looks perfect. I have no issues with and of my other WiFi devices. I had such high hopes for these. I'm very disappointed. :(
author: KLR2mom

review: This product has barely ever worked.  It is in the same room as our router & can't connect to our network due to low signal strength.  Our smart TV that is located all the way across the house from our router has no problems connecting to our network.  What a waste of my time & money.  Luckily there is a 30-day return window & I'll be sending mine back today.
author: Sassy

review: I love it! I had a Chromecast, but my Amazon Fire TV Stick is like a Chromecast on steroids!I could never play my purchased Amazon songs on the Chromecast...But, now...I can play everything on my Amazon music, on my Fire TV Stick .Plus, its so much easier to do all selections of movies, tv, music, pictures, etc...right on tv screen with either the Fire TV Stick app or the included remote control :)
author: Colleen R Hand

review: This would be great if it actually worked!  Freezes all the time and keeps disconnecting from my wifi. (And it couldn't be closer to my router...about 8 inches away). When it works...it's great!  But that would be about 25% of the time.  I'm constantly unplugging it.  One of these days it's just not going to be plugged back in.  If you have an Xbox...pretty much the same thing, but your Xbox actually works when you turn it on!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I don't know if we got a bad egg, or if the product could really be THIS finicky. It's required at least one reboot let day, apps are contantly kicking up, and sometimes the device flat-out REFUSES to connect to the remote the device came with.The worst part is, there's no more than 20 feet between the stick and our router. We've gone back to using our PS3 for media streaming, haven't had a single issue get.Returning unit for replacement. I'll give it one more chance, but if the next one is the same I wouldn't recommend this to someone I hated.
author: Patrick Anderson

review: not working very well,keep having trouble hooking up to my wireless line.the system has only worked one time.
